name: swig-cli
description: Swig is a simple CLI tool for automating dev workflows via compositions of series and parallel tasks.

scripts.build: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && node tasks.cjs insertVersionNumbers
scripts.pack: node tasks.cjs cleanPackedDir && npm pack --pack-destination packed
scripts.updateExamples: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build && npm run pack && node tasks.cjs updateExampleDependencies
scripts.updateExamplesAndSmokeTest: node tasks.cjs cleanDist && npm run build && npm run pack && node tasks.cjs updateExampleDependencies && node tasks.cjs smokeTest
scripts.publishFull: npm run build && npm run updateExamplesAndSmokeTest && npm publish

author: Mike Thompson
